SELECT SEQ_QNA.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO QNA (QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_CLASS, MEMBER_NO, HIDDEN_STATUS) VALUES (#{qnaNo}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaClass}, #{memberNo}, #{hiddenStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_CLASS, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.HIDDEN_STATUS, TO_CHAR(Q.QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_VIEW, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM QNA Q, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = Q.MEMBER_NO AND QNA_NO = #{QNANo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, QNA_NO, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_DATE, QNA_CLASS, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, HIDDEN_STATUS, QNA_VIEW FROM ( SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.QNA_DATE, Q.QNA_CLASS, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME, Q.HIDDEN_STATUS, Q.QNA_VIEW FROM QNA Q, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = Q.MEMBER_NO AND Q.QNA_NO > 0
ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= 1 ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC, QNA_DATE DESC
